title: Enjoy incredible views at Lofts at Farmers Market! Studio 503 SqFt!
posting_body: ['-- Lofts at Farmers Market --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1325', 'Apartment:', 'Studio Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '503 sq ft', 'Another feature that makes the Lofts stand out in the crowd is our prime location.', "You'll find us in the Historic Lowertown neighborhood across from the Farmer's Market and CHS Field, plus the Union Depot Light Rail Station is just 1.5 blocks away!", "Transportation is a breeze with I-94, I-35E, Hwy 5, and US 52 nearby, but you won't have to travel far to find great destinations.", "Mears Park is just across the street and it's a great place to go for a walk, have a picnic, or enjoy one of the many community events including the Twin Cities Jazz Festival and Music in Mears summertime concerts.", "There are also plenty of restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues close by, so you'll never get bored living at the Lofts!", 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '◾ 24 Hour Availability', '◾ Accepts Credit Card Payments', '◾ Accepts Electronic Payments', '◾ Barbecue Area', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cardio Equipment', '◾ Controlled Access', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Grocery Delivery Available', '◾ Parking Garage', '◾ 24 Hour Availability', '◾ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Bike Repair Stations', '◾ Community-Wide WiFi', '◾ Controlled Access Building', '◾ Dry Cleaning Service Available', '◾ Kingsley Excellence Award', '◾ Pet Washing Station', '◾ Property Manager on Site', 'Apartment features include:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Baseball Field and Farmers Market Views', '◾ Big Windows', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Double Pane Windows', '◾ Granite Countertops', '◾ High Ceilings', '◾ Linen Closet*', 'In Select Homes', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Patio/Balcony*', 'In Select Homes', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', '260 5th St E', 'St. Paul, MN 55101', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Managed by Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Please note pricing and availability subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'EF57BD46DB5D403']
